sourcesContent:
import React,{useRef,useState} from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css'; import {Container,Row,Col,Form,ListGroup} from 'reactstrap'; import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom'; import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/AvgRating'; import avatar from '../assets/images/avatar.jpg' const TourDetails = () => { const {id}=useParams() const reviewMsgRef=useRef() //this is static data later we will call our api const tour=tourData.find((tour)=>tour.id === id) //destructure properties const {photo,title,desc,price,address,reviews,city,distance,maxGroupSize}=tour const {totalRating,avgRating}=calculateAvgRating(reviews); //formate date const options={day:"numeric",month:"long",year:"numeric"}; return ( <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating ===0 ? null: avgRating} {totalRating ===0 ? ( "Not rated" ):( ({reviews?.length}) )} {address}
{city} ${price}/per price {distance} k/m {maxGroupSize} people
Description

{desc}

{/* Tour reviews section */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
{ reviews?.map(review=>(
Kusuma

{new Date ('06-19-2024').toLocaleDateString( 'en-US',options )}

5
Amazing tour
)) }
) } export default TourDetails
